Your units have mastered fire magic!

The Witch of Seven Lights used the first moon talisman as the activation of the talisman card array, giving the capital +20% [ICON_Production] productivity. This city can build an additional area, and gain +15% [ICON_Production] productivity when constructing buildings and wonders, and gain an additional 20% [ICON_Production] productivity bonus when conducting projects.

The Witch of Seven Lights will use a powerful spell card to summon a double-A substitute messenger with power and speed. [NEWLINE] "Stand throw tiles!" Qiyao Witch shouted. But it seems that this was originally an emoticon of Fran.

Combat units gain +7 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending on forest or rainforest cells. All units can now "freely travel" through woods and rainforests. If you own the Vietnam DLC, you can plant plantations in advance. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Before the battle begins, it’s better to take a breather. Qiyao Witch thought so. There is an old saying: "If a worker wants to do his job well, he must first sharpen his tools." Perhaps using this [COLOR:60,200,15,255] wooden talisman [ENDCOLOR] would be a good choice.

Coastal cities receive an additional +2 [ICON_Housing] housing and +1 [ICON_Amenities] amenity. All cities gain +35% [ICON_Production] productivity when building "aqueducts" or "ports", and cities with aqueducts will receive an additional +1 [ICON_Amenities] amenity. Immediately unlock the "Celestial Navigation" and "Shipbuilding" technologies, and +1 [ICON_Movement] movement for water transport units. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] "Drink more hot water!" Sakuya and the eldest lady often say this. The Scarlet Devil Mansion originally uses black tea as its signature drink, but the Witch of Seven Lights is not suitable for drinking tea. So, she wrote the four-character mantra on the spell card, hoping to remember it all the time.

Enemy units within 2 cells of the friendly city will be burned by [COLOR:255,90,90,255][ENDCOLOR]: suffer 5 points of [ICON_Damaged] damage each round. [NEWLINE] Enemy units within 2 cells of friendly combat units will suffer [COLOR:255,90,90,255] vulnerability[ENDCOLOR] effect: -4[ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending. +40 strategic resource reserve. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]As with all Western magic stereotypes, a magician who can't fireball is not a good magician. But it seems that the era of chaos and chaos has passed? Perhaps the more "mild" Firestorm version is the answer...

The quarries in the territory +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, and the mines +1 [ICON_Gold] gold coins. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Turning readily available materials into gold is every alchemist's ultimate dream. Although the Witch of Nanaya is not interested in the money market in Gensokyo, it is still better than nothing. After all, the name sounds very "cool".

The Witch of the Seven Lights will use an extremely powerful spell card, which will create a [COLOR:240,240,0,255] high-light era [ENDCOLOR] without darkness. [NEWLINE] "Light the way forward!" Hey, where have you heard this sentence before? [NEWLINE]While in the [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age, all cities receive +5% [ICON_Science] technology value, [ICON_Culture] culture value, [ICON_Gold] gold coins, and [ICON_Production] productivity. This spell card will gain an additional 26 era points after being cast.
[COLOR:160,70,160,255]金木水火土日月符「真正的贤者之石」[ENDCOLOR]

This is the most powerful spell card of the Seven Lights Witch with no side effects. Its only drawback is that it consumes too much energy and requires the guidance of other elemental spell cards. Use this final blow to detonate the whole place! [NEWLINE] Randomly unlock 5 [ICON_TechBoosted] Eurekas and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspirations. [NEWLINE]Increase the [ICON_Science] technology and [ICON_Culture] culture value of all cities by 10%. [NEWLINE]All cities [ICON_Strength] have defense +10. [NEWLINE]Remove all fog of war and achieve maximum [ICON_VisSecret] diplomatic visibility for all civilizations.

The Philosopher's Stone has not yet been activated. Complete the spell card array of seven different elements to awaken the energy of the Philosopher's Stone! [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR:255,0,0,255]Warning: Do not attempt to activate the unawakened Philosopher's Stone, otherwise it will bring devastating disaster. [ENDCOLOR]

This compass endowed with magical power will bring growing profits to the city, take advantage of it! [NEWLINE] Each era after construction or final restoration adds an additional [ICON_Science] and [ICON_Culture] points.
As we all know, this entrance is a quick passage to the Earth Spirit Palace.

The Scarlet Devil Mansion Radio Station is exclusively sponsored by "Scarlet Sounds". It can provide more [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music masterpiece slots, require higher [ICON_Power] power consumption, obtain [ICON_GreatWork_Music_Themed] theme bonus, and produce [ICON_Production] productivity equal to the area adjacent bonus. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] "Hey, the same song has been number one for seven weeks in a row. Maybe it's time to give up the number one spot to someone else this week?"
When displaying masterpieces from different great people, the theme bonus increases by 2.5 times, but there is no additional travel performance.

Get thematic bonus when displaying masterpieces of the same genre. Without a theme, masterpieces by the same great man will only gain an additional 2 points. But why would you throw something precious in there?
Get thematic bonus when displaying [ICON_GreatWork_Music] musical masterpieces from different great people of the same genre.
of the Great Library of Voiru

+495% [ICON_Production] productivity when building the wonder "Great Library". [NEWLINE]If the Witch of the Seven Lights owns the Great Library, Datu will get 4 additional [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] writing slots and 2 [ICON_Housing] housing. [NEWLINE]If the Witch of the Seven Lights builds the Great Library, she will immediately get an [ICON_GreatWriter] great writer. [NEWLINE]However, [ICON_Tourism] from the [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] book has -100% performance because the Great Library of Voiru is closed to the public.

Qiyao Witch has a special reconnaissance unit with high mobility. It can automatically return to the city when attacked. It even has special effects. I don't know how much higher it is than the scouts.

Both combat and civilian units have -1 [ICON_Movement] movement. [NEWLINE] Unique elemental spell card activation arrays can be built in the municipal area to release advanced spell cards. [NEWLINE]There is a special great person [ICON_GreatMageElements] "Great Elementalist", which can be collected and summoned by points.
The Witch of the Seven Lights can gather the power of the seven elements by chanting spell cards. Continuously accumulate energy.
The characteristic building of Qiyao Witch. The [ICON_Science] technological value and [ICON_Culture] cultural value provided will continue to increase as the times progress.

Strengthen your physical fitness and move towards faster, higher and stronger! go ahead! Move forward without hesitation! [NEWLINE]After completing these two projects, the Witch of the Seven Lights will be full of vitality, converting the original mobility debuff into faster mobility.

The Scarlet Devil Mansion Radio Station is exclusively sponsored by "Scarlet Sounds". It can provide more [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music masterpiece slots, requires higher [ICON_Power] power consumption, and can obtain [ICON_GreatWork_Music_Themed] theme bonus.
When activated, nearly every [ICON_GreatMageElements] can produce a masterpiece, with the remaining few having their own unique effects. Visit the Greats Panel to learn more and track your progress.

Give [ICON_RESOURCE_MAGE_PATCHOULI_SPELLCARD_AQUA_STYLE_TOD] "Mysterious Gensokyo TOD" and [ICON_RESOURCE_MAGE_PATCHOULI_SPELLCARD_AQUA_STYLE_LLR] "Mysterious Gensokyo LLR" each. Each luxury item can provide +1 [ICON_Amenities] livability to 6 cities. [NEWLINE] The current city has +10 [ICON_Power] power load. When the current city has sufficient [ICON_Power] power supply, it will increase [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance and [ICON_Gold] gold coin output by 100%.
《In that garden where the flowers are colorful...》
「同人于東方之野」典出《易經》〈同人〉卦辭：「同人于野，亨」；「野」（郊外）是相對於「國」（城裡人）的概念，在此即指相對於商業製作的同人創作。「東方之野」一方面表明本刊主題是東方Project，另一方面，也是對應《東方永夜抄》三面boss、掌握歷史的上白澤慧音的主題曲〈Plain Asia〉（或譯〈東方的平原〉）
"Oriental Chronicles ~ The Story of the Two Princesses in Horai"
《Bibliotheca 劇毒少女 publication number V》
GRIFFON Kami Shirasawa Huiyin Shirasawa ver.

Unlocks the builder's ability to build rare earth formations. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+10[ICON_Science] technology value, +3[ICON_Gold] gold coins. Provides +1 Charm to surrounding cells. You can also launch ultimate devices from it. Unlocking more technologies will provide more [ICON_Gold] gold coins.

Unlocks the builder's ability to build Elfwells. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1[ICON_Faith] faith value, +1[ICON_Gold] gold coin. Units on the Elf Well can recover all health points in 1 turn. Units can teleport over the Well. Unlocking more technology and culture can provide more [ICON_Science] technology value, [ICON_Culture] culture value, [ICON_Faith] faith value, [ICON_Production] productivity and [ICON_Gold] gold coins. Each city can only build one Elf Well.
As long as you can find out the opponent's weaknesses, anyone can defeat them.

Great Witch of Qiyao, you have complete control over the mysteries of elemental magic. On your compass, there is a vast sea of ​​stars. Use many spell cards to continuously strengthen yourself and explore the world to your heart's content!

Enhance your physical fitness, become faster, higher and stronger! Patchouli must not let go of the fitness skills she learned from Yong Lin! [NEWLINE]Completing this project will free Patchouli from the "All units [ICON_Movement] -1 movement" debuff.

This is a personalized music and dance course tailored by Meiling for Patchouli in order to prepare for M1 Manga. After completion, Patchouli will be full of life and vitality, and all units will have +1 extra [ICON_Movement] movement when moving. [NEWLINE] Of course, M-1 Mancai also has its mysteries, especially when it "moves" for the first time after the 10-round cooldown.

You can use magic to explore supernatural space phenomena through bugs with the help of the Secret Club. Once completed, the current city will lose 2 [ICON_Citizen] population points and your exoplanet exploration will be accelerated by 1 light year per turn. [NEWLINE][ICON_New][COLOR:255,45,45,255]Warning: The city must have at least 3 [ICON_Citizen] population before sending an envoy out of Gensokyo to visit the Secret Club. If the city has less than 3 [ICON_Citizen] population, it will not receive any benefits! [ENDCOLOR]

Lianzi and Mei Li successfully crossed the boundary and found the secret of a different world outside the system! The speed of exoplanet exploration will be increased by 1 light year each round, bringing you one step closer to technological victory!

An improved green device inspired by Reimu's spell cards, it can hit wherever you point it, faster than the fastest legend in Gensokyo. No radiation and no pollution. The only drawback is that using it too much will cause the game to crash.

MAD, an Oriental stationary series, appeared on the Lantern Festival stage for the second time, but the production team was fragmented and had no choice but to end it with four parts. Get the [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka for "Rocket Research" and "Satellite" immediately. When rushing water and bursting fire merge, water vapor is formed. All unimproved forest cells receive +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins and +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value. Theaters and business centers receive a standard bonus from adjacent woods, and colleges and industrial areas receive a small bonus.

Cities with geothermal fissures or volcanoes have an additional +2 [ICON_Amenities] habitability and +15% [ICON_Production] productivity. [NEWLINE] The Academy, Theater Square, Industrial and Commercial Districts receive additional massive adjacency bonuses from volcanic and geothermal landforms. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] There are abundant geothermal resources under the volcano, which is very suitable for heating. As for the eruption? That's another story.

Cast the power of the sun and fire at the same time! Causes interference from solar hurricanes and high-speed particles. [NEWLINE]Except for the Witch of the Seven Lights, all declared war civilizations will suffer three rounds of all-channel blocking electromagnetic interference, and all units will be stunned for three [ICON_Turn] rounds. The ultimate secret to casting this deadly spell card is [COLOR:255,50,50,255]by whatever means necessary[ENDCOLOR]. If you turn on the "Troubled Times" mode, you will have more effects. All civilizations will be shocked, their dissatisfaction with you will not decrease, they will not be able to produce or purchase settlers and religious units, and their diplomatic influence will be reduced so much that no normal envoys will be willing to obey your orders. -100% [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance throughout the empire. Citizens will not become war-weary. +150% loot gain, +125% combat experience for all combat units, +30% [ICON_Production] productivity when producing military and civilian units. [NEWLINE]+495% [ICON_Production] productivity when building [ICON_Nuclear] nuclear devices. Gentlemen are harmonious but not harmonious; villains are harmonious but not harmonious.
When will the moon come in the blue sky? I'll stop drinking and ask. I have admired you for a long time and am willing to be with you.
I hope you will come to my humble home someday and say goodbye today.
Alas! There is no shortage of tricks and strategies!
The ants are barbaric! Don’t you know what your destiny is? How dare you hit an egg against a stone?

He relies on deceit and conspiracy, but I rely on the laws of heaven; he relies on force, but I rely on the human heart. Regardless of whether our country is loyal and trustworthy, its armor, its etiquette, and its oars, everyone dares to die. Even if our country has more than 20 provinces and more than 400 people, how can it be difficult to reduce the fierce flames and show the prestige of our country? Some of them shared the same hatred with the enemy, so they charged into battle, or they donated money to help Xianxiang. The court did not hesitate to give special rewards to reward loyalty. If Gou is born from outside, retreats in the face of battle, is willing to be disobedient, and turns out to be a traitor, I will punish him immediately and severely without mercy. I have high hopes for all the ministers and ministers in heaven, who each have a loyal heart and share the anger of gods and men!
How can you, the barbarians, reach the heights of elegance? Go quickly.
I have prepared a small gift for the time being, so please don’t blame me.

You behave like a Jie and a captive, building large-scale construction projects, desecrating the country and harming the people, being greedy, cruel and violent, and making people on the roadside look at you harshly. Your sin will be exposed to the world today! (condemn you)
I am the magician from the Red Devil Library, and I am honored to meet you today.
There is a city nearby and I would like to have a chat with you. How about it?
Thank you for the invitation, it's disrespectful. Please feel free to enlighten me.
Isn't it beautiful that my mansion is filled with thousands of books, your blog is full of knowledge, and it incorporates all thoughts and trends?
The Scarlet Devil Mansion has its own national conditions.
The Silver Chariot can gain 50% more experience in combat.
